appearance.description: Young man with spiky black hair and turquoise eyes characteristic of the Déos. His appearance adapted to life on Teria but he retains the distinctive traits of his race.
appearance.face: Oval, noble features, piercing turquoise eyes that glow with ether
appearance.hair: Deep black, naturally spiky (Dragon Ball style), glows turquoise with ether
appearance.skin: Tanned, slightly golden, some training scars

combat.weapons: Martial arts, hand-to-hand, various weapons (prefers melee)
combat.fightingStyle: Offensive, brawler, acts in direct synergy with his twin sister Aeria

personality.temperament: Brawler at first, but highly intelligent and destined to evolve alongside Aeria
personality.values: Justice, protecting innocents, unwavering fraternal loyalty
personality.weaknesses: Ignorance of his origins, sense of responsibility toward his sister
personality.motivations: Discover his origins with Aeria and understand their powers
personality.fears: Losing Aeria, never knowing the truth

skills.naturalTalents: Continuous ether absorption, physical resistance, twin synergy. Quick martial arts learning, shared reflexes with Aeria
skills.education: Basic village education, supplemented by growing intellect

connections.family: Malvin & Elise Bulon (adoptive parents), Marie (adoptive sister), Aeria (twin sister, MC)

background.childhood: Son of King Darian and Queen Lysandra. Forced exile to Teria as an infant with twin Aeria, mother's death
background.importantEvents: Loss of biological parents, forced exile, adaptation to human life
background.quests: Discovering their origins together, investigating Cadfael's offer

narrative.storyArc: Hero in the making, quest for identity as a duo
narrative.futureDevelopment: Force balancing, intellectual maturation as a duo
